background.background: fixed linear-gradient(to left, #000a, #0000 10%, #0000 90%, #000a), fixed linear-gradient(to top, #000f, #000f 40%, #0000 80%, #0000), fixed center / 12% auto repeat url('★/background-hexcasting.png'), #000

fixed linear-gradient(to left, #0002, #0000 5%, #0000 95%, #0002), fixed linear-gradient(to top, #000f, #0008 7.5%, #0000 40%, #0000), fixed top / 100% auto repeat-x url('★/background-ocean.png'), fixed linear-gradient(#0090c8, #0090c8), #00435d
